00058 #       define sf_uuid(str)                                                                                                                             \
00059                 static const module::guid& _get_uuid() {                                                                        \
00060                         static const module::guid g = module::guid::guid_from_string(str);              \
00061                         return g; }

00113 template<class I>
00114 module::HResult interface_cast(module::IUnknown* pUnk, I** pp)
00115 {
00116         return pUnk->QueryInterface(UUID_PPV(I, pp));
00117 }

00128 inline void safe_release(module::IUnknown* pUnk)
00129 {
00130         if(pUnk) pUnk->Release();
00131 }
